metadata:
Belize Protected Areras Map

Table of Contents

    Identification Information
    Data Quality Information
    Spatial Data Organization Information
    Spatial Reference Information
    Entity and Attribute Information
    Distribution Information
    Metadata Reference Information
     


IDENTIFICATION_INFORMATION


  Citation:
    Citation_Information:
      Originator: Jan Meerman
      Publication_Date: 20110218
      Title: Belize Protected Areras Map
      Edition: 20110218
      Geospatial_Data_Presentation_Form: Map
      Publication_Information:
        Publication_Place: El Progresso, Cayo District, Belize
        Publisher: Jan Meerman
      Other_Citation_Details:
Meerman J. C., 2011, Belize Protected Areas Map Shapefile. http: HTTP://biological-diversity.info
      Online_Linkage: HTTP://biological-diversity.info
      Larger_Work_Citation:
        Citation_Information:
          Originator: Belize Biodiverstiy Mapping Service
          Publication_Date:
          Title: Belize Biodiversity Mapping Service
          Publication_Information:
            Publication_Place: Belmopan, Belize.
            Publisher:
          Online_Linkage: HTTP://biological-diversity.info
  Description:
    Abstract:
Digital protected area polygon data were created using the
various issues of the Government Gazette Statutory
Instruments with added information of private landholdings
that opt to qualify as a Private Protected Areas within
BAPPA. This is a work in progress with several inconsistancies.
    Purpose:
The dataset was developed to aid in the Conservation
Planning of Belize.
    Supplemental_Information:
These data are not to be taken as legal defenitions of
names, protected areas or their location. Preferential
Scale 1:100.000
This is a work in progress with many inconsistencies.
  Time_Period_of_Content:
    Time_Period_Information:
      Range_of_Dates/Times:
        Beginning_Date:
        Ending_Date: 20110218
    Currentness_Reference: 20110218
  Status:
    Progress: In work
    Maintenance_and_Update_Frequency: Irregular

Top





DATA_QUALITY_INFORMATION


  Attribute_Accuracy:
    Attribute_Accuracy_Report:
  Logical_Consistency_Report:
  Completeness_Report:
Dataset was available to the Protected Areas Consortium
dealing with the National Protected Areas Policy and
Systems Plan. Comments and corrections from this consortium
were incorporated in
this file as per 2005. Since then aspiring protected areas
within the Belize Association for Private Protected Areas
(BAPPA) has been incorporated. Adding and modifying PA's
based on published Staturory instruments is a continuous
process.
Latest modification is the modification of the Crooked Tree
Lagoon Complex, this PA has notoriously ill defined boundaries.

    Process_Step:
      Process_Description:
Origianal file originating from the Lands Information
Center within the Ministry of National Resources (pre
1996). Corrected
and updated using Statutory instruments published in the
Governement Gazette 1984 - 2011. Additional input received
from: Coastal Zone Management Institute; Forest Department
and "consortium" involved with the National Protected Areas
Policy and Systems Plan (2005) + Belize
Association for Private Protected Areas (BAPPA) database as
per 2007.
      Source_Used_Citation_Abbreviation:
      Process_Date:
      Source_Produced_Citation_Abbreviation:

          Contact_Electronic_Mail_Address: meerman@biological-diversity.info
          Hours_of_Service:

  Resource_Description:
The Belize Protected Areas Map Shapefile was originally
produced as
part of the National Protected Areas Policy and Systems
Plan (2005) and updated for the Land Use Policy Formulation
Project (2011).
  Distribution_Liability:
Users must assume responsibility to determine the
appropriate use of these data. The boundaries can not be
seen as legal defenitions. Files as are is.
